text: CLOSE Blake Lively recently shared a photo on Instagram flaunting her post - pregnancy body, 14 months after giving birth to her second child. USA TODAY The ` ` post - baby body'' is one of Hollywood's most unforgiving myths, in which women are expected to transform their bodies back to their pre - birth shapes as fast as possible. Then, there's Blake Lively, who shared on Instagram exactly how hard she worked to lose weight after giving birth to her second child in September 2016. The 30 - year - old actress revealed on Instagram Monday that she lost 61 pounds in the months since giving birth, posing in a sports bra and leggings and thanking her trainer Don Saladino for helping her with the process. ` ` Turn
